DEFAULT_ERRORS.SERVER_ERROR: Request could not be completed due to server encountered error. Please try again later.
DEFAULT_ERRORS.TEMPORARILY_UNAVAILABLE: Service currently unavailable. Please try again later.
DEFAULT_ERRORS.INVALID_REQUEST: Request could not be completed due to invalid request. Kindly check your request and try again.
DEFAULT_ERRORS.VALIDATION_ERROR: Request could not be completed due to invalid parameters. Kindly check provided entries and try again.

AUTH_ERRORS.UNAUTHORIZED: The user is not authorized to make the request.
AUTH_ERRORS.INVALID_TOKEN: The authorization credentials provided for the request are invalid. Check the value of the Authorization HTTP request header.
AUTH_ERRORS.EXPIRED_TOKEN: Session Expired. Check the value of the Authorization HTTP request header.
AUTH_ERRORS.REQUIRED_TOKEN: The user must be logged in to make this API request. Check the value of the Authorization HTTP request header.

USR_ACC_ERRORS.USR_ACC_NEW_MISSING_EMAIL: Please specify an email address to register
USR_ACC_ERRORS.USR_ACC_NEW_INVALID_EMAIL: Please specify a valid email address to register
USR_ACC_ERRORS.USR_ACC_NEW_EMAIL_EXISTS: An account is already registered with this email address. Please use a different email address to complete the registration
USR_ACC_ERRORS.USR_ACC_NEW_MISSING_PWD: Please specify a password to register
USR_ACC_ERRORS.USR_ACC_NEW_INVALID_NAME: Please specify a valid name to register
USR_ACC_ERRORS.USR_ACC_LOGIN_MISSING_EMAIL: Please specify an email address to login
USR_ACC_ERRORS.USR_ACC_LOGIN_INVALID_EMAIL: Please specify a valid email address to login
USR_ACC_ERRORS.USR_ACC_LOGIN_MISSING_PWD: Please specify a password to login
USR_ACC_ERRORS.USR_ACC_LOGIN_INVALID_CRE: Please specify a valid username and password to login
USR_ACC_ERRORS.USR_ACC_RESET_MISSING_EMAIL: Please specify an email address to reset password
USR_ACC_ERRORS.USR_ACC_RESET_INVALID_EMAIL: We are unable to locate an account with this email address
USR_ACC_ERRORS.USR_ACC_RESET_INVALID_RESET_CODE: Please specify a valid reset code
